      • getHsqldbEntityManagerFactoryProperties

        protected Map<String,String> getHsqldbEntityManagerFactoryProperties(String persistenceXmlFile)

      • getHsqldbEntityManagerFactoryProperties

        public static Map<String,String> getHsqldbEntityManagerFactoryProperties(String jpaProviderClass,
                                                                         Class<?> testClass,
                                                                         String persistenceXmlFile)
        Retrieves the EntityManagerFactory properties required to properly talk to a HSQLDB instance.
        Parameters:
        jpaProviderClass - The classname of the JPA provider.
        testClass - The unit test class itself.
        persistenceXmlFile - The classpath-relative path to the persistence XML file to be used.
        Returns:
        The properties for the HSQLDB-compliant EntityManager.
